properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: website_name
properties.description: (Required) This is the name of the test and the website to be monitored.

properties.name: website_url
properties.description: (Required) The URL of the website to be monitored

properties.name: check_rate
properties.description: (Optional) Test check rate in seconds. Defaults to 300

properties.name: contact_id
properties.description: Deprecated (Optional) The id of the contact group to be added to the test. Each test can have only one.

properties.name: contact_group
properties.description: (Optional) Set test contact groups, must be array of strings.

properties.name: test_type
properties.description: (Required) The type of Test. Either HTTP, TCP, PING, or DNS

properties.name: paused
properties.description: (Optional) Whether or not the test is paused. Defaults to false.

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: (Optional) The timeout of the test in seconds.

properties.name: confirmations
properties.description: (Optional) The number of confirmation servers to use in order to detect downtime. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Optional) The port to use when specifying a TCP test.

properties.name: trigger_rate
properties.description: (Optional) The number of minutes to wait before sending an alert. Default is 5.

properties.name: custom_header
properties.description: (Optional) Custom HTTP header, must be supplied as JSON.

properties.name: user_agent
properties.description: (Optional) Test with a custom user agent set.

properties.name: node_locations
properties.description: (Optional) Set test node locations, must be array of strings.

properties.name: ping_url
properties.description: (Optional) A URL to ping if a site goes down.

properties.name: basic_user
properties.description: (Optional) A Basic Auth User account to use to login

properties.name: basic_pass
properties.description: (Optional) If BasicUser is set then this should be the password for the BasicUser.

properties.name: public
properties.description: (Optional) Set 1 to enable public reporting, 0 to disable.

properties.name: logo_image
properties.description: (Optional) A URL to a image to use for public reporting.

properties.name: branding
properties.description: (Optional) Set to 0 to use branding (default) or 1 to disable public reporting branding).

properties.name: website_host
properties.description: (Optional) Used internally, when possible please add.

properties.name: virus
properties.description: (Optional) Enable virus checking or not. 1 to enable

properties.name: find_string
properties.description: (Optional) A string that should either be found or not found.

properties.name: do_not_find
properties.description: (Optional) If the above string should be found to trigger a alert. 1 = will trigger if find_string found.

properties.name: real_browser
properties.description: (Optional) Use 1 to TURN OFF real browser testing.

properties.name: test_tags
properties.description: (Optional) Set test tags, must be array of strings.

properties.name: use_jar
properties.description: (Optional) Set to true to enable the Cookie Jar. Required for some redirects. Default is false.

properties.name: post_raw
properties.description: (Optional) Use to populate the RAW POST data field on the test.

properties.name: final_endpoint
properties.description: (Optional) Use to specify the expected Final URL in the testing process.

properties.name: enable_ssl_alert
properties.description: (Optional) HTTP Tests only. If enabled, tests will send warnings if the SSL certificate is about to expire. Paid users only. Default is false

properties.name: follow_redirect
properties.description: (Optional) Use to specify whether redirects should be followed, set to true to enable. Default is false.
